story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: No matter how much you fight, it’s pointless!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
As long as we have Ultra Wormholes, we’ll
continue to get new pawns!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh? They suddenly disappeared. I wonder why.
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0600_10: Oh no! The Ultra Beasts are getting out of control!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
They may be confused since they no longer have
a way home.
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I don’t know what’s going on, but does that mean
we won’t have any more Ultra Beasts?
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_0900_10: Then we should defeat all these guys...
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1000_10: and calm down the Ultra Beasts!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1100_10: Wh-why did the Ultra Wormholes suddenly close?
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1200_10: We should be OK with these guys.
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You’ll be fine! I’m sure you’ll be able to get
back home!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Plus, here on Pasio, there are loads of people and
Pokémon from different places!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1800_10:
And if you like it here, you can stay as long as
you want!
story_alola_02_08000/2401_1001_1900_10: We’ll also be here with you—together!
